Pricing Analyst Assignment
Pricing Approved for {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Number__c}
Dear {!Opportunity.Pricing_Analyst__c},
You have a opportunity assigned for pricing review as Pricing Analyst. Opportunity Name:{!Opportunity.Name} Opportunity Number:{!Opportunity.Opportunity_Number__c}
Click the link below to open the Opportunity record and See the NCR Payments Fee section to review pricing. After making any necessary pricing adjustments, use the approve button in the section NCR Payment Processing, to approve the pricing.
Make sure appropriate documentation is attached in the File section on the opportunity. Reach out to the requestor if additional related documents are required to review pricing.
Click Here To View Opportunity Record.
Warmest regards,
Salesforce Admin & Support
